summary: This code is formatting Python files, using autopep8 to enforce maximum line length and Black to ensure consistent formatting. It prevents changes on the original content by redirecting output to a view-only mode.

details.comment: This code is formatting Python files, using autopep8 to enforce maximum line length and Black to ensure consistent formatting. It prevents changes on the original content by redirecting output to a view-only mode.
details.content:
# view only. no change on original content.
# of course, for lines with long content, we will have trouble.
MAXINT=1000000000
cat test.py | autopep8 --max-line-length $MAXINT - | black -l $MAXINT -C - 2>/dev/null
